Project File Information Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

In the Project Explorer window, select Project»File Information to display this dialog box. You also can right-click the project root in the Project Explorer window and select View»File Information from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to view where files that a LabVIEW project references are located on disk and in the Project Explorer window.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • File Paths—Displays the file paths for all files in the project.
  • Corresponding Project Items—Displays the location(s) of a file in the Project Explorer window. You must select a file from the File Path list to display this information. You also can use the Path property to view the file path for a file in the project programmatically.
  • Export File Paths—Saves all file paths to a text file. Use the file dialog box to navigate to the directory in which you want to save the text file.
    Note  You must save the project before you can export file paths.
